Class StateEditor

java.lang.Object
  State
      StateEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener
public class StateEditor
extends State

The StateEditor is a mode of the program that allows the user to create and modify map files that can be played in StateGame. StateEditor is a subclass of State

Author:
Ramsey Kant
